mapper.select: select * from articles order by article_num desc
select m.mb_profile_pic, a.* from articles a, members m where a.mb_id=m.mb_id and a.mb_id='mb_id 01' order by a.article_num desc
select m.mb_profile_pic, a.* from articles a, members m where a.mb_id=m.mb_id and a.mb_id='mb_id 02' order by a.article_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into articles (article_title, article_content, mb_num, carping_level, latitude, longitude, carping_pic1) values (#{article_title}, #{article_content}, #{mb_num}, #{carping_level}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{carping_pic1})
mapper.select: select * from members where mb_id=#{mb_id} and mb_pwd=#{mb_pwd}
select a.*, m.mb_nickname, m.mb_profile_pic from articles a, members m where a.mb_num = m.mb_num and article_num = #{article_num}
mapper.insert: insert into comments (mb_num, article_num, comment_content) values (#{mb_num}, #{article_num}, #{comment_content})
insert into members (mb_id, mb_pwd, admin_yn, mb_profile_pic, mb_nickname) values (#{mb_id}, #{mb_pwd}, #{admin_yn}, #{mb_profile_pic}, #{mb_nickname})
